column3: Concept ACK.\n\nYou have to rebase with master.
> Invalid push? Reset to [845d14c](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/845d14cff70c5da741952c2395adbead263516a5)?\n\nYeah my bad
No need to rebase. Could just force push the already reviewed commit?
> No need to rebase. Could just force push the already reviewed commit?\n\nI thought the same thing but @promag asked for a rebase
We had issues with travis earlier today, but it is possible to just reset a travis run without a rebase or otherwise touching the commit.
I did not know that, but good to know

concept ACK, the code is in `TxToJSON`:
```c++
                entry.pushKV("time", pindex->GetBlockTime());
                entry.pushKV("blocktime", pindex->GetBlockTime());
```
though instead of repeating the text I'd prefer `Same as "blocktime"
`
